metadata.title: CVE-2017-16896 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A SQL injection in classes/handler/public.php in the forgotpass componentof Tiny Tiny RSS 17.4 exists via the login parameter.

criterions.comment: tt-rss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
